oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1959-09-26 - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 2 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from September 26, 1959. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), Ferlin Husky (host/performer), guest performers Johnny Horton, Betty Johnson, and Jimmy Driftwood, and regular performers the Jordanaires, Tommy Jackson, Chet Atkins, Minnie Pearl, and Del Wood. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN. It is announced that this is the 1042nd broadcast.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Chet Atkins; Minnie Pearl; Ferlin Husky; Betty Johnson; Grant Turner; Del Wood
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Ferlin Husky introduces Chet Atkins -- Three Little Words (Chet Atkins) -- Grant Turner introduces Minnie Pearl -- Comedy routine (Minnie Pearl) -- The Proof Is In The Puffing (Ferlin Husky) (recording) -- Ferlin Husky introduces Betty Johnson -- Lonely Willow Tree (Betty Johnson, Grant Turner) -- Grant Turner introduces Del Wood -- Gizmo Rag (Del Wood) -- Grant Turner and Ferlin Husky talk -- I'll Always Return (Ferlin Husky) -- Closing theme -- Closing statement (Ferlin Husky) -- Camel Cigarettes commercial -- Network announcements
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; Grand ole opry (Radio program); Ryman Auditorium (Nashville, Tenn.); United States.
